survey_name: Consumer Preferences for In-Car Technology Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights into consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding in-car technology features to help automotive manufacturers and technology providers better meet customer needs.

questions.question_text: How important are in-car technology features when deciding to purchase a new vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How important are in-car technology features when deciding to purchase a new vehicle?

questions.question_text: Which of the following in-car technology features do you currently use most often? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question. Ensure the options are randomized to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following in-car technology features do you currently use most often? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the in-car technology features in your current vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced Likert scale. Ensure mobile compatibility.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the in-car technology features in your current vehicle?

questions.question_text: What additional in-car technology features would you like to see in future vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure a text box is provided.

script.question_text: What additional in-car technology features would you like to see in future vehicles?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to pay extra for advanced in-car technology features?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale question to gauge willingness to pay. Ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How likely are you to pay extra for advanced in-car technology features?
